description: XSS Challenge Level 13 - Triangle difficulty. Accepts user input via 'name' query parameter and validates XSS payloads using PhantomJS browser automation.
notes: Intentionally vulnerable endpoint. Requires bypassing blacklist filter to execute XSS. Blacklist filters include: script, onerror, onclick, onmouseover, single quote ('), and space. Currently returns 500 error due to missing phantomjs installation or validation.js issues. This is the primary attack surface for the application. Uses PhantomJS to execute payloads and detect XSS alert with message 'XSS'. X-XSS-Protection header is set to 0 (intentionally disabled).
